features: Running inspiration: With an athletic bottom unit and a slim, lightweight construction, you’ll look and feel fast
Summer ready: With quick-drying, breathable mesh and an anti-odor S-Café® sockliner, as well as siped lugs for drainage. Ideal on land or in water
Effortless convenience: The collapsible heel lets you wear it as a slide or a shoe, and the Quicklace™ makes adjusting the fit fast and easy
Collapsible heel: Wear your shoes like a normal shoe, or slide it on and off with the heel collapsed
Quicklace™: Minimalistic and strong lace for one-pull tightening. Easy-on, easy-off
Welded upper: Stitch-free upper construction provides a smooth, glove-like, fit and feel
